text: Daniel Sachs Goldman (born February 26, 1976) is an American politician and lawyer. He is a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from New York's 10th congressional district. He has been called a progressive.https://progressives.house.gov/ He is a member of the Democratic Party. Before, he was part of the lead majority counsel in the first impeachment inquiry against Donald Trump and lead counsel to House Managers in Trump's impeachment trial which was also in 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Dan Goldman official U.S. House website *Dan Goldman for Congress campaign website * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Dan Goldman
